item.title: Crisis for Computer Science careers
item.description: Are there tangible benefits for the IT sector when hiring university graduates? A two-year program can fill the industry's needs?. The latter are valid questions that we should ask ourselves if we want to bring the university to current times. [6min read]

item.title: Collaborative Edition
item.description: Manubot an Open Source git-based tool.
